text: Ramjeevan is an Indian film composer and musician in the Tamil film industry. == Education == Ramjeevan attended D.A.V Boys Higher Secondary School, Gopalapuram, Chennai and graduated from DG Vaishnav College, Arumbakkam, Chennai. == Career == He debuted in the Tamil movie Aalamaram. The song "Aalamara Kathada" sung by Vijay Prakash and Harini was a hit. Other songs of the album such as "Thereri vaararu", "Kuthu Rasikum", "Kolladhe ennai" and "Silsillai" received a positive response. == Discography == {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Title !! Language !!
